feedback.feedbackString: Wan should be written from top to down
Wan should not be too flat

misClassify.feedbackString: Wan is curve and Shu is vertical line
misClassify.name: Shu

misClassify.feedbackString: Wan and Gou looks similar, but Wan doesn't have hook at bottom
misClassify.name: Gou

misClassify.feedbackString: Wan and Pie looks similar, but Pie is more flat and Wan is more vertical and thin
misClassify.name: Pie

misClassify.feedbackString: Wan and Na are different, Na is more flat and left to right concave curve, and Wan is updown convex curve
misClassify.name: Na
